mapper.insert: insert into feed(feed_picture, maked_uid, challenge_id, register_date, feed_contents) values (#{feed_picture}, #{maked_uid}, #{challenge_id}, now(), #{feed_contents})
mapper.select: select * from feed order by register_date desc limit 0, 1000
mapper.delete: delete from likes where uid = #{uid} and feed_id = #{feed_id}
mapper.select: select f.* from feed as f left outer join challenge as c on f.challenge_id = c.challenge_id where c.challenge_title = #{keyword} order by f.register_date desc
select f.* from feed as f left outer join challenge as c on f.challenge_id = c.challenge_id where c.fit_id = #{keyword} order by f.register_date desc
